title: The Children's fountain
creator_credit: United Nations, U.S. Committee for UNICEF and George Zabriskie
brief_description: Shows the programs of the Turkish Government to improve the health and welfare of their children. These programs are aided by UNICEF and other UN agencies. They are seen through the eyes of a young nurse, who takes additional special training and becomes part of a pilot project for rural nursing.
creator_credit_for_label: United Nations, U.S. Committee for UNICEF and George Zabriskie
